response: "{ \"title\": \"Divisible Digit Sum\", \"description\": \"Write a function that calculates the sum of all digits in an integer. Then, check if this sum is divisible by the original number.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef divisible_digit_sum(n: int) -> bool:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `n` (int): A positive integer.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns `True` if the sum of all digits in `n` is divisible by `n`, `False` otherwise.\\n\", \"code\": \"def divisible_digit_sum(n: int) -> bool:\\n    # Calculate the sum of all digits in n\\n    total = 0\\n    for digit in str(n):\\n        total += int(digit)\\n    # Check if the sum is divisible by n\\n    return total % n == 0\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert divisible_digit_sum(12) == True\", \"assert divisible_digit_sum(19) == False\", \"assert divisible_digit_sum(777) == True\", \"assert divisible_digit_sum(1001) == False\"] }"
